title: When are reports not going to be automated
body: I get 10 game chat restriction because i flamed an adc who was inting and flaming me but he doesn't have shit happen to me all of enemy teram agreed that he was toxic but i am the one that gets punished because of his duo seriously riot fix your fucking game i hate habing shen adc him runing it down and flaming me for carrying him then i get punished because i call him out :/
